docs.title: Welcome to Arctyk Projects
docs.text: This documentation covers all projects developed by the Arctyk team, excluding Arctyk ITSM.

docs.title: Project Categories
docs.text:
• Internal Tools
  • Experimental Apps
  • Integrations

For ITSM-related content, visit Arctyk Docs.

docs.title: About Arctyk Projects
docs.text:
ArctykDev is the development branch of the Arctyk ecosystem — focused on experimentation, innovation, and internal tooling.

These docs serve as a unified reference for non-ITSM Arctyk projects.

docs.title: Experiments
docs.text: Here you’ll find ongoing prototypes, UI concepts, and sandbox environments for testing new technologies.

docs.title: Integrations
docs.text: The Integrations section documents APIs and connectors between Arctyk projects and external systems (e.g., GitHub, SharePoint, Power Platform).

docs.title: Project Overview
docs.text:
This section provides a bird’s-eye view of active and archived Arctyk projects.

Project Description Status Arctyk Integrator Tool for connecting Arctyk apps with 3rd-party services Active Arctyk Tools Utilities for managing internal workflows Active Arctyk Proto Experimental R&D app ideas Experimental

docs.title: Developer Tools
docs.text: This section includes scripts, SDKs, and CLI utilities that support development across the Arctyk ecosystem.
